item.title: Video Streaming in Elixir
item.description: This is blog version of the Livebook. You can try interactive nootbook here Mix.install([ {:req, "~> 0.4.5"}, {:ex_cmd, "~> 0.10"}, {:plug, "~> 1.15"}, {:kino, "~> 0.11"}, {:bandit, "~> 1.1"} ]) Introduction Port is standard way to run external programs in Elixir and Erlang. However, communicating with spawned external programs over stdio can lead to various issues. ExCmd and Exile libraries tries to address these issues. On top of that they provide beloved streaming capabilities.
